name: Love cake
info: Preparation: 600 ml of milk, 120 g of density, 200 g of sugar, 150 g of chocolate, 100 g of ground roasted hazelnuts, 100 g of hazelnut wafers, 250 g of butter, 200 ml of sweet sour cream, 300 g of hazelnut cream.Preparation:First we make the filling to cool it down. Mix the thickener and sugar, then pour a little cold milk, and bring the rest to a boil. Mix the thickener and sugar with the milk and cook in boiling milk. Stir until thickened, remove from heat, add chocolate and stir until melted. Cover with foil and leave to cool.While the filling is cooling, first peel. Turn on the oven to preheat to 180 degrees. Beat the egg whites until foamy, gradually add sugar and stir to obtain a firm foam. Then gradually add the egg yolks and oil in a stream. Finally, add sifted flour and cocoa, and combine everything with a spatula.

name: Newlyweds
info: Preparation: Chocolate cake with cookies is for all those who like a very rich cream. From the title, we can see that it is with chocolate, as well as that the preparation is very simple, so it will surely be liked by everyone with a lack of time. You can make a cake with cookies by adding some of your favorite ingredients because it is absolutely subject to changeThe simplest chocolate cake with biscuits - without cooking and baking

name: Purple heart
info: Preparation: The stated dimensions are for a 20 cm diameter mold. We can only finish the cake with whipped cream, but with the crunchy grill it is something special. Separate a spoonful of juice to color part of the whipped cream for decoration.Fruits, mostly frozen - blueberries, berries, raspberries, currants, put on a plastic strainer over a clean pan and sprinkle with sugar to release the juice, which we will use later. Set aside one tablespoon of juice to decorate the cake. It takes several hours for the fruit to drain well. Cover the fruit so that it does not dry out. Blueberries, chokeberries, cherries and currants can be spent overnight on a strainer in the refrigerator.

name: Rock'n-roll cake
info: Preparation: Prepare a cake tin with a diameter of 20 cm, grease it, put cut paper on the bottom. Turn on the oven to heat to 200 ° C, and when you add the biscuit dough, reduce it to 180 ° C. It is important for the patisserie that as many eggs as there are, there should be a spoonful of sugar, flour and oil. Separate the egg yolks and egg whites. Be careful, because the yolk can fall into the bowl with the egg whites, and if we don't take it out completely, we won't be able to whip the sham. Let the bride and groom separate the egg whites above the other bowl, and from there let them transfer to a whisk. Whisk the egg whites with a mixer, and when the sham is white, add one tablespoon of sugar at a time. When the sham is firmly beaten, add the egg yolks one by one, and set the mixer to the lowest speed. Add one tablespoon of oil at a time. Stir for a short time, then add a teaspoon of baking powder and one by one spoon of sifted flour, then lightly with a mixer, or blender,

name: Purple hearts
info: Preparation: Whisk the egg whites with sugar, add biscuits and flour, then hazelnuts (150g), from this mass bake 2 crusts in a tray lined with baking paper at 200 C for about 15 minutes. When the leaves are baked and cooled, sprinkle them with lemon or orange juice. And the filling: whisk the egg yolks with the sugar and steam them. Add whipped margarine with a little powdered sugar (optional) and coarsely grated white Milka chocolate to the cooled mixture. Filling II: Whip the whipped cream with milk, then add roasted ground hazelnuts and chopped dark chocolate. Fill like this: crust, I fil, II fil, crust, I fil, II fil, whipped cream. Top with melted chocolate icing and 1 tablespoon of oil, and decorate the cake with whipped cream.

name: Blue heart
info: Preparation: In one large bowl (because this is a really large mass… there are still 2 boxes of biscuits) mix all the ingredients and slowly add the orange juice (in this case Fantu).Stir with your hands until all the ingredients are well combined and add more juice if necessary (It should be a thick mass, but still not too thick and not too dry… so you can shape it fine… I think 2 dl guys is quite ok !! I write this weird because I almost memorize it by feeling, and then I bite a little… test rehearsal, then add what I miss… Maybe it will even be too sweet for someone, so I say, you should try and add ingredients to taste)

name: Birds on a branch
info: Preparation: In one large bowl (because this is a really large mass… there are still 2 boxes of biscuits) mix all the ingredients and slowly add the orange juice (in this case Fantu).Stir with your hands until all the ingredients are well combined and add more juice if necessary (It should be a thick mass, but still not too thick and not too dry… so you can shape it fine… I think 2 dl guys is quite ok !! I write this weird because I almost memorize it by feeling, and then I bite a little… test rehearsal, then add what I miss… Maybe it will even be too sweet for someone, so I say, you should try and add ingredients to taste)
